## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description | Type     | Default |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| `selectedIndex` | `selected-index` |             | `number` | `0`     |


## Events

| Event                  | Description | Type                  |
| ---------------------- | ----------- | --------------------- |
| `admiraltyTabSelected` |             | `CustomEvent<number>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                                    | Description                                                |
| ------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--admiralty-tab-group-font-size`                       | Font size for the tab group                                |
| `--admiralty-tab-group-font-weight`                     | Font weight for the tab group                              |
| `--admiralty-tab-group-heading-first-child-margin-left` | Margin left for the tab group heading first child          |
| `--admiralty-tab-group-heading-margin-left`             | Margin left for the tab group heading                      |
| `--admiralty-tab-group-heading-not-desktop-padding`     | Padding for the tab group heading when not in desktop view |
| `--admiralty-tab-group-heading-padding`                 | Padding for the tab group heading                          |
| `--admiralty-tab-group-horizontal-rule-margin`          | Margin for the tab group horizontal rule                   |
| `--admiralty-tab-group-not-desktop-font-size`           | Font size for the tab group when not in desktop view       |
